requirementText.name: Other Content Information Type Specification
requirementText.description: When the mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE has the value "OTHER" the mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE must state the content information type.

dependencies.dependency: The value of the other attribute determines the existence of this attribute.
The value of the attribute MUST NOT be from the vocabulary.

rule.description: If mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE = "OTHER" then mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE MUST NOT have a value from the VocabularyContentInformationTypeSpecification because these vocabulary values MUST be used for the attribute mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE.

error.message: mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE attribute has a value that MUST instead be used for mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE. MUST be: mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE MUST describe a content information type that falls outside of the VocabularyContentInformationTypeSpecification vocabulary.

package.name: minimal_IP_with_1_rep_mets_csip-CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE_value_OTHER
package.description: Minimal IP that matches all MUST requirements, mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE = "OTHER", mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE = "SIARDUK".

rule.description: If mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE exists then mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE MUST be "OTHER".

error.message: mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE exists although mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE is not "OTHER". MUST be: mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE MUST only exist if mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE = "OTHER".

package.name: mets-xml_mets_csip-CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE_value_not_OTHER_and_csip-OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE_exists
package.description: METS.xml file has mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE equal to a value from VocabularyContentInformationTypeSpecification, but not "OTHER" (e.g. "ERMS"), and mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE exists (e.g. is "SIARDUK").

package.name: minimal_IP_with_1_rep_mets_csip-CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE_value_OTHER
package.description: Minimal IP that matches all MUST requirements, mets/@csip:CONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE = "OTHER", mets/@csip:OTHERCONTENTINFORMATIONTYPE = "SIARDUK".
